I have moved a lot, but I always take my favorite green clothes with me.

content.text: Hello, what is your favorite book?
The Little Prince. I love the illustrations and the story is so simple but deep.
I love that book too! I have never met anyone else who has read it. What is your favorite part?
I think my favorite part is when the little prince meets the fox. The fox teaches the little prince about the importance of friendship and how to love.
That is my favorite part too! The fox is such a wise character.
What do you do for fun?
I like to play video games and spend time with my family.
I love playing video games too! What are your favorite games?
I love playing Mario Kart and Zelda.
I love Mario Kart! I also like playing Pokemon.
I love Pokemon too! It is one of my favorite games.
Pikachu is a great Pokemon! It is so cute and friendly.
I agree! Pikachu is the best!
